markdownRemark.html:
My effort continues on Out the Door with some new artwork, a rewrite (of sorts) to fix the build process, which has led to something of a self-driven code review.

Wanna Play?

Sure you do! Head over to my davidwesst.itch.io/out-the-door to give it a whirl in your browser (no install needed) or Windows! It’s totally free, and feedback is always appreciated.
